original_text: Jesus called his disciples to him and said, “I have compassion for these people; they have already been with me three days and have nothing to eat. I do not want to send them away hungry, or they may collapse on the way.”
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들을 불러 이르시되 내가 무리를 불쌍히 여기노라 그들이 나와 함께 있은 지 이미 사흘이매 먹을 것이 없도다 길에서 기진할까 하여 굶겨 보내지 못하겠노라

sentences.original_text: Jesus called his disciples to him
I have compassion for these people
they have already been with me three days
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이미 나와 함께 사흘을 있었다

sentences.original_text: I do not want to send them away hungry
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 굶긴 채로 돌려보내고 싶지 않다

sentences.original_text: or they may collapse on the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 그들이 길에서 쓰러질지도 모른다
